name: runner
description: Local testing and cleanup scripts for SoundCloud downloader

scripts.test: cd .. && bash setup-act/setup-act.sh && act workflow_dispatch --bind --container-architecture linux/amd64
scripts.test:local:
npm run cleanup && cd ../soundcloud-token-getter && npm install && node index.js && cd ../soundcloud-downloader && npm install && node download.js euphonicsessions && cd .. && mkdir -p artifact-preview && cp -r soundcloud-downloader/tracks/* artifact-preview/ && echo '
Files created in artifact-preview:' && ls -lah artifact-preview/ | head -20
